about_the_game:
The original soundtrack to Akihabara - Feel the Rhythm.

01 - Future Sound, Part 1
02 - Future Sound, Part 2
03 - Electric Town
04 - Dejitaru;Sakkaku
05 - Stay Golden
06 - Journey
07 - Drive
08 - H15
09 - H16
10 - The Neon Nights
11 - Future Sound, Part 1 (Midnight Mix)
12 - Future Sound, Part 2 (Midnight Mix)
13 - Stay Golden (Midnight Mix)
14 - H16 (Midnight Mix)
15 - The Neon Nights (Midnight Mix)
16 - Cailies Theme
